reset_password_email_arravied: If email arravied in your email, click for redirect to reset passord screen.
reset_password_put_email: Put your email account, and will be send a message with validation link to change passsword.
onboard_welcome_description: Enquantum provides clear and comprehensive explanations of physics concepts, covering basic fundamentals to advanced topics.
onboard_welcome_task_management_descript: The app offers a wide range of formulas and equations used in physics. Each formula is accompanied by a detailed description and application examples.
onboard_welcome_agile_description: One of the main features of the app is the presence of interactive animated simulations. These simulations allow students to visualize physical phenomena in a practical and realistic manner.
